(46) 176.23rd April, 1946.CABINET.Ministerial Committee oil Economic Planning.COMPOSITION AND TERMS OE REFERENCE.Note by the Secretary of the Cabinet.WITH the approval of the Prime Minister, the Ministers who exercise, onthe Cabinefs behalf, a general over-sight over the work of economic planning andsupervise the work of the Official Steering Committee on Economic development will henceforth be known as the Ministerial Committee on Economic Planning.The Membership of the Committee is Lord President of the Council (Chairman).Chancellor of the Exchequer.President of the Board of Trade.Minister of Labour and National Service.The Secretary to the Committee is Mr. M. T. Flett (Office of the lord president).(Signed)E. E. BRIDGES.Cabinet Office, S. W. 1,'23rd April, 1946.[31714]
